SEARCH
Package jpacman.model

Class PlayerMoveTest

java.lang.Object
jpacman.model.GameTestCase
jpacman.model.MoveTest
jpacman.model.PlayerMoveTest
public class PlayerMoveTest extends MoveTest
Specialize the general MoveTest test suite to one that is tailored to PlayerMoves. Thanks to inheritance, all test cases from MoveTest are also methods in PlayerMoveTest, thus helping us to test conformance with Liskov's Substitution Principle (LSP) of the Move hierarchy.

Version:
$Id: PlayerMoveTest.java,v 1.8 2008/02/10 19:51:11 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen; August 21, 2003.
